result.execSummary:
The defendant Jerome L Jacobs Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jerome L Jacobs Jr is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jerome L Jacobs Jr was found guilty of Possess w/Intent-THC (<=200 grams), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(h)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

03:21 PM Defendant Jerome L Jacobs in court with attorney Michael J. Short. Prosecuting Atty Rebekah M Rennicke appeared for State of Wisconsin.     Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to count 3.  Court accepted defendant's plea, found and adjudged defendant guilty. 


On Motion of the State, the Court DISM Count 1, 2. 
On Motion of the State, the Court DISM 2nd and sub enhancer on Count 3 

Victim Rights Compliance

COUNT 3   
Court withholds sentence and places the Defendant on Probation for  18 months cc to ES in 2011CF000136

CONDITIONS:

-Not use/possess drug paraphernalia and/or controlled substances without valid prescription
-DNA on file
-Any other conditions DOC may impose

COURT COSTS:
Ct 3
-DNA surcharge waived
-All other CC, due on probation

-Bond posted to be applied to fines and cc only and remainder returned to poster.


-Days credit for time already served:  120 days
-Days credit if revoked: 120 days

Objection by defense, waived argument. Court granted motion for bind over.
